EmailTemplate.name: 202006_APAC_BGA_Virtual_Operator_Conference_ON24.Invite with calendar
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now! The Asia-Pacific Operators Conference Webinar on 16 June 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en]]> Hello,
In these unprecedented times, we feel it is even more important to keep in touch with our customers and to make sure you are up to date with the latest information and product developments. As we do not have the opportunity to meet in person during this time, I am pleased to announce our Asia-Pacific Operators Conference Webinar.
This webinar will include Mechanical and Avionics product updates, address service hot topics, Customer & Product Support self-service / portal updates, customer experience improvement activities, and other technological changes we have implemented based on your feedback.
You are cordially invited, along with your colleagues, to join us online for these important updates. We expect the webinar to last approximately 90 minutes.
The Honeywell support team is looking forward to meeting you through our B&GA Operators Conference webinar. DATE June 16, 2020 TIME 12:30 a.m. GMT LOCATION Online and On-Demand HOSTED BY Matt Spence
REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/06/bga-apac-webinar-june-16]]>
Sincerely,
Matt Spence Senior Manager, Customer and Product Support Business and General Aviation (B&GA Asia-Pacific) © 2020 Honeywell International Inc. This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can edit your profile <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AERO_Preference_Center.html]]> or unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>.
